name: James Fu
bio: Python is one of my favorite languages. I fell in love with it seeing the beautiful absence of brackets and semi-colon. I also love it for list comprehension and its extensive use in Machine Learning and Raspberry Pi. I think everyone should learn Python!

name: Zoid
bio: I love writing Python, because I find it easy to read and write Python, and the community is generally amazing and friendly.

name: Hamed Zaghaghi
bio: Experienced software product manager with almost four years of working on artificial intelligence products. Team leader and expert C/C++, Python developer with a demonstrated history of working in the A.I. industry.
